CustomField.formula: IF(OR(Overall_Status2__c= 'Pending Reschedule', ISNULL( FS_Scheduled_Install_Date__c), FS_Survey_Install_On_Hold__c = true , AND(ISNULL(FS_NewRemodelOutletOnlyProjectedFireUp__c), FS_Dry_Install__c = true)) , Date(2020, 12, 31), IF( NOT(ISNULL(FS_Change_Onboarding_Date__c)) , FS_Change_Onboarding_Date__c , IF( NOT(ISNULL(FS_NewRemodelOutletOnlyProjectedFireUp__c)) , FS_NewRemodelOutletOnlyProjectedFireUp__c + FS_HowManyDaysAfterInstallOnboarding__c , FS_Scheduled_Install_Date__c + FS_HowManyDaysAfterInstallOnboarding__c ) ))
CustomField.label: Original Onboarding Date
